name: Game & Watch Gallery 2
synopsis: Game & Watch Gallery 2 is a collection of five classic handheld games; playable in their original 80s version and a remastered version with enhanced graphics, sound, and new gameplay. Parachute - catch the parachutists before they fall into the sea. Helmet - dodge the falling tools and head for the shed. Chef - juggle ingredients with your frying pan as long as you can. Vermin - use your mallets to keep the moles and other critters at bay. Donkey Kong - destroy the platform below DK while avoiding the barrels.
